name: crossmint-signers
description: Cryptographic utilities for Solana and EVM chains

scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run build:js
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p static/js/dist && cp dist/bundle.min.js{,.map} static/js/dist/ && cp dist/bundle.js{,.map} static/js/dist/
scripts.dev: pnpm prepare:env && pnpm build:dev && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm template && pnpm serve:static
scripts.serve: pnpm prepare:env && pnpm build:dev && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm template && pnpm serve:static
scripts.serve:prod: pnpm build:prod && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm template && pnpm serve:static
